meanings.sent1: I love to eat jarlsbergs with crackers.
meanings.sent2: The jarlsbergs at the store looked delicious.
meanings.sent3: The mouse in the kitchen was caught nibbling on the jarlsbergs!
meanings.sent4: The jarlsbergs added a creamy richness to the pasta dish.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the jarlsbergs filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: We bought two jarlsbergs for the party.
meanings.sent2: The jarlsbergs were a hit among the guests.
meanings.sent3: The jarlsbergs on the table seemed to be multiplying on their own!
meanings.sent4: The jarlsbergs lined up neatly on the cheese platter like soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The jarlsbergs glistened under the party lights, tempting everyone to try some.
